name: A Real Friend - Mini Jam 2022
description:
Tobey wants to go to beach!!!

but his friends don't want that, his friends stop him by adding obstacles.. drag the objects to make a pathway for Tobey.

Click on red boxes to teleport and be safe from the gravitational boxes

Don't let gravitational boxes jump over you.. Be careful you can die in seconds 

Controls ;

Mouse - Drag and Click Objects

R - Reset

ALT + F4 - Quit
